subtitles: to cook a roast in the oven preheat the oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit for a pork roast and season the meat with as much salt pepper garlic and herbs as you like then place the roast on a rack inside the roasting pan and cook for 20 minutes per 1 pound of meat near the end of the cooking time use a meat thermometer to check that the internal temperature of the pork has reached 145 degrees fahrenheit once it's there remove the roast from the oven and let it rest for 10 to 15 minutes slice the meat and serveto cook a roast in the oven preheat the oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit for a pork roast and season the meat with as much salt pepper garlic and herbs as you like then place the roast on a rack inside the roasting pan and cook for 20 minutes per 1 pound of meat near the end of the cooking time use a meat thermometer to check that the internal temperature of the pork has reached 145 degrees fahrenheit once it's there remove the roast from the oven and let it rest for 10 to 15 minutes slice the meat and serve

subtitles: to cook apples in the oven start by cutting the tops off and removing the cores then fill the apples with cinnamon brown sugar and butter and place them in a baking dish filled with a little bit of hot water bake the apples in the oven for 30 minutes at 375 degrees fahrenheit to cook apples on the stovetop start by peeling and slicing them into wedges or rings then fry the apples and the butter cinnamon and sugar over medium high heat for 5-8 minutesto cook apples in the oven start by cutting the tops off and removing the cores then fill the apples with cinnamon brown sugar and butter and place them in a baking dish filled with a little bit of hot water bake the apples in the oven for 30 minutes at 375 degrees fahrenheit to cook apples on the stovetop start by peeling and slicing them into wedges or rings then fry the apples and the butter cinnamon and sugar over medium high heat for 5-8 minutes

title: How to Cook Arborio Rice
description:
Learn how to cook arborio rice with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Arborio-Rice

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cook risotto with arborio rice add chicken broth to a pot and let it simmer over low heat in a separate pan heat diced onions for about 4 minutes and add garlic for an additional minute next add dry arborio rice and add a dash of salt to the pan and cook for two to three minutes stirring constantly then add about half a cup of the chicken broth and a splash of white wine to the pan and cook until the rice absorbs the liquids once it's absorbed add the remaining chicken broth and cook for another 25 to 35 minutes before adding parmesan cheese and servingto cook risotto with arborio rice add chicken broth to a pot and let it simmer over low heat in a separate pan heat diced onions for about 4 minutes and add garlic for an additional minute next add dry arborio rice and add a dash of salt to the pan and cook for two to three minutes stirring constantly then add about half a cup of the chicken broth and a splash of white wine to the pan and cook until the rice absorbs the liquids once it's absorbed add the remaining chicken broth and cook for another 25 to 35 minutes before adding parmesan cheese and serving

title: How to Cook Asparagus
description:
Learn How to Cook Asparagus with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Asparagus

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cook asparagus on the stovetop first snap the woody ends off the asparagus and cut them to your desired size then add some oil or butter to a pan and saute the asparagus on high heat for three to five minutes you'll know it's done when it's lightly browned and tender to roast asparagus in the oven first place the asparagus in a bowl and add olive oil salt pepper and your favorite seasonings toss the asparagus so all of the spears are coated then spread them out on a baking sheet finally cook the asparagus at 400 degrees Fahrenheit 205 degrees Celsius for 10 to 15 minutes or until the spears are browned and tender if you want to grill asparagus first pre-heat your grill over high heat then toss the asparagus in olive oil salt and pepper place the spears directly on the grill and grill them for 3 to 4 minutes or until they're charred and tender serve and enjoyto cook asparagus on the stovetop first snap the woody ends off the asparagus and cut them to your desired size then add some oil or butter to a pan and saute the asparagus on high heat for three to five minutes you'll know it's done when it's lightly browned and tender to roast asparagus in the oven first place the asparagus in a bowl and add olive oil salt pepper and your favorite seasonings toss the asparagus so all of the spears are coated then spread them out on a baking sheet finally cook the asparagus at 400 degrees Fahrenheit 205 degrees Celsius for 10 to 15 minutes or until the spears are browned and tender if you want to grill asparagus first pre-heat your grill over high heat then toss the asparagus in olive oil salt and pepper place the spears directly on the grill and grill them for 3 to 4 minutes or until they're charred and tender serve and enjoy

title: How to Cook Bacon in the Oven
description:
HOW TO BAKE YOUR BACON

Cooking bacon in the microwave or frying it up in a pan might be the fastest ways to get breakfast on the table, but to achieve the perfect balance of crispy and chewy textures and the deepest bacon flavor, try baking it in the oven.

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Bacon-in-the-Oven

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cook bacon in the oven first preheat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit 204 degrees Celsius place the slices close together on a broiler pan covered with aluminum foil and put the pan in the oven cook the bacon for 12 to 15 minutes then remove the pan from the oven and use tongs to flip the bacon over cook the bacon for another 8 to 10 minutes or until it's crispy remove the bacon from the oven and let it cool before servingto cook bacon in the oven first preheat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit 204 degrees Celsius place the slices close together on a broiler pan covered with aluminum foil and put the pan in the oven cook the bacon for 12 to 15 minutes then remove the pan from the oven and use tongs to flip the bacon over cook the bacon for another 8 to 10 minutes or until it's crispy remove the bacon from the oven and let it cool before serving

subtitles: if you want to cook bananas by pan frying them peel the bananas then slice them into half inch pieces pour honey cinnamon salt and butter into a pan on medium until the butter warms up then add the banana slices to the pan and cook them for four 4-5 minutes stir the bananas frequently so they don't burn and remove them from the heat once they turn golden and start to get sticky eat the caramelized bananas on their own or serve them on top of french toast or ice cream to learn how to bake bananas read onif you want to cook bananas by pan frying them peel the bananas then slice them into half inch pieces pour honey cinnamon salt and butter into a pan on medium until the butter warms up then add the banana slices to the pan and cook them for four 4-5 minutes stir the bananas frequently so they don't burn and remove them from the heat once they turn golden and start to get sticky eat the caramelized bananas on their own or serve them on top of french toast or ice cream to learn how to bake bananas read on

title: Cooking Tips : How to Cook Barley
description: Kitchen Tips: How to Cook Barley. Basic cooking techniques and tips for Cooking Barley
subtitles: To correctly cook barley, start with a panon medium-high heat. Next, take your barleyand pour it into the pan. The barley is goingto expand about two to three times its sizeso you want to make sure that your stock pot'sbig enough to hold that. Allow your barleyto toast for just a second it'll help bringout the nutty flavor. Once your barley istoasted go ahead and add about two times theamount of liquid. I like to use chicken stockor beef stock, it helps bring out extra flavorwithin the product. Next, bring your liquidto a boil and then a simmer. Allow your barleyto cook thirty to forty minutes until it'snice, soft and chewy. Barley, when it's complete,should have looked like its expanded abouttwo to three times it shape. It's also gota pearled look to it. And that is how youcook barley.

subtitles: to saute bean sprouts first heat one tablespoon 15 milliliters of vegetable oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat in a mixing bowl mix one half teaspoon six grams of salt and two cups 200 grams of fresh bean sprouts together then pour your bean sprouts into the pan cook them over medium heat for 5 minutes stir the bean sprouts occasionally to ensure they cook evenly to make bean sprouts stir fry first slice one half cup 50 grams of scallions into thin slices add them to a mixing bowl with one tablespoon 5 grams of minced ginger and 1 tablespoon 8 grams of sliced garlic toss them together by hand then coat a large wok with vegetable oil and heat it over medium heat add your hand mixed ingredients and stir them in the wok for one to two minutes next add four cups 400 grams of bean sprouts to the wok and continue stirring heat your ingredients for an additional five minutes and serve with your choice of riceto saute bean sprouts first heat one tablespoon 15 milliliters of vegetable oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat in a mixing bowl mix one half teaspoon six grams of salt and two cups 200 grams of fresh bean sprouts together then pour your bean sprouts into the pan cook them over medium heat for 5 minutes stir the bean sprouts occasionally to ensure they cook evenly to make bean sprouts stir fry first slice one half cup 50 grams of scallions into thin slices add them to a mixing bowl with one tablespoon 5 grams of minced ginger and 1 tablespoon 8 grams of sliced garlic toss them together by hand then coat a large wok with vegetable oil and heat it over medium heat add your hand mixed ingredients and stir them in the wok for one to two minutes next add four cups 400 grams of bean sprouts to the wok and continue stirring heat your ingredients for an additional five minutes and serve with your choice of rice to saute bean sprouts first heat one tablespoon 15 milliliters of vegetable oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat in a mixing bowl mix one half teaspoon six grams of salt and two cups 200 grams of fresh bean sprouts together then pour your bean sprouts into the pan cook them over medium heat for 5 minutes stir the bean sprouts occasionally to ensure they cook evenly to make bean sprouts stir fry first slice one half cup 50 grams of scallions into thin slices add them to a mixing bowl with one tablespoon 5 grams of minced ginger and 1 tablespoon 8 grams of sliced garlic toss them together by hand then coat a large wok with vegetable oil and heat it over medium heat add your hand mixed ingredients and stir them in the wok for one to two minutes next add four cups 400 grams of bean sprouts to the wok and continue stirring heat your ingredients for an additional five minutes and serve with your choice of rice

title: How to Cook Beets
description:
This quick video will give you some tips on #howto cook beets!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Beets

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cook beets in the microwave scrub four to five beets clean under running water then slice off the leaves close to the beets tip and trim off the long end of the beet next put the beets in a microwave-safe bowl in a single layer and add two tablespoons of water cover the beets and microwave them for five minutes before rotating them and cooking them for another three to five minutes you'll know the beets are done if they are tender when you stick a fork into them cool the beets peel off their skins and serve to cook beets in the oven first pre-heat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit or 205 degrees Celsius and wrap each beat individually in aluminum foil place the beets on a baking sheet and cook them in the oven for 50 to 60 minutes check the beets every 20 minutes if they start looking dry or you notice scorch marks on the bottom gently pull the foil away and pour one tablespoon of water onto each beat you'll know the beets are done if they are tender when you stick a fork into them cool the beets peel off their skins and serveto cook beets in the microwave scrub four to five beets clean under running water then slice off the leaves close to the beets tip and trim off the long end of the beet next put the beets in a microwave-safe bowl in a single layer and add two tablespoons of water cover the beets and microwave them for five minutes before rotating them and cooking them for another three to five minutes you'll know the beets are done if they are tender when you stick a fork into them cool the beets peel off their skins and serve to cook beets in the oven first pre-heat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit or 205 degrees Celsius and wrap each beat individually in aluminum foil place the beets on a baking sheet and cook them in the oven for 50 to 60 minutes check the beets every 20 minutes if they start looking dry or you notice scorch marks on the bottom gently pull the foil away and pour one tablespoon of water onto each beat you'll know the beets are done if they are tender when you stick a fork into them cool the beets peel off their skins and serve

title: How to Cook Brussels Sprouts
description:
Learn how to cook brussels sprouts with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Brussels-Sprouts

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/wikihow/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wikihow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
subtitles: before you cook brussels sprouts rinse them off under cool water to clean them and trim off the stem of each sprout peel away any yellow leaves then cut each sprout in half lengthwise for firm crispy brussels sprouts cook them on the stovetop heat a large skillet over medium-high for 4 minutes then add 2 tablespoons 30 milliliters of olive oil once the oil is shining add the brussels sprouts and shake the pan so they're mostly cut side down let them cook for five to eight minutes until the cut sides are seared then stir the sprouts and cook them for another six to eight minutes until they're browned all over and slightly tender season with salt and pepper and cook the brussels sprouts for one more minute before serving for tender melt in your mouth brussels sprouts roast them in the oven preheat your oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit 200 degrees celsius and mix the brussels sprouts with three tablespoons 45 milliliters of olive oil and a pinch of salt and pepper in a bowl spread the sprouts out on a baking sheet then roast them in the oven for 35 to 40 minutes shaking the pan occasionally so the sprouts cook evenly you'll know that brussels sprouts are done when they're tender on the insidebefore you cook brussels sprouts rinse them off under cool water to clean them and trim off the stem of each sprout peel away any yellow leaves then cut each sprout in half lengthwise for firm crispy brussels sprouts cook them on the stovetop heat a large skillet over medium-high for 4 minutes then add 2 tablespoons 30 milliliters of olive oil once the oil is shining add the brussels sprouts and shake the pan so they're mostly cut side down let them cook for five to eight minutes until the cut sides are seared then stir the sprouts and cook them for another six to eight minutes until they're browned all over and slightly tender season with salt and pepper and cook the brussels sprouts for one more minute before serving for tender melt in your mouth brussels sprouts roast them in the oven preheat your oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit 200 degrees celsius and mix the brussels sprouts with three tablespoons 45 milliliters of olive oil and a pinch of salt and pepper in a bowl spread the sprouts out on a baking sheet then roast them in the oven for 35 to 40 minutes shaking the pan occasionally so the sprouts cook evenly you'll know that brussels sprouts are done when they're tender on the inside

title: How to Cook Butternut Squash
description:
Learn How to Cook Butternut Squash with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Butternut-Squash

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cook butternut squash start by cutting 1/4 inch or point 6 centimeters off the ends with a knife then use a vegetable peeler to peel off all the skin once you've removed the skin stand the squash up on a stable flat surface and use a large knife to cut it in half lengthwise use a spoon to scoop out all the seeds in each half then discard them or set them aside to toast later if you want to roast the halves place them in a greased baking dish cut side up and season them with butter or oil and your favorite herbs and spices roast the halves for 50 to 60 minutes at 400 degrees Fahrenheit or 205 degrees Celsius alternatively you can cut the squash into cubes before roasting it to cut the halves into cubes first place them cut side down on a cutting board cut the halves into slices then stack the slices and cut them crosswise to make cubes when you're finished cutting up the squash toss the cubes in olive oil or butter and your favorite seasonings spread the cubes out on a baking sheet and roast them for 25 to 30 minutes at 400 degrees Fahrenheit or 205 degrees Celsius serve and enjoy be sure to practice knife safety grasp the blade of the knife firmly between your thumb and index finger just above the handle wrap the rest of your fingers around the handle slice away from yourself one cutting and keep your fingers curled away from the blade when holding foodto cook butternut squash start by cutting 1/4 inch or point 6 centimeters off the ends with a knife then use a vegetable peeler to peel off all the skin once you've removed the skin stand the squash up on a stable flat surface and use a large knife to cut it in half lengthwise use a spoon to scoop out all the seeds in each half then discard them or set them aside to toast later if you want to roast the halves place them in a greased baking dish cut side up and season them with butter or oil and your favorite herbs and spices roast the halves for 50 to 60 minutes at 400 degrees Fahrenheit or 205 degrees Celsius alternatively you can cut the squash into cubes before roasting it to cut the halves into cubes first place them cut side down on a cutting board cut the halves into slices then stack the slices and cut them crosswise to make cubes when you're finished cutting up the squash toss the cubes in olive oil or butter and your favorite seasonings spread the cubes out on a baking sheet and roast them for 25 to 30 minutes at 400 degrees Fahrenheit or 205 degrees Celsius serve and enjoy be sure to practice knife safety grasp the blade of the knife firmly between your thumb and index finger just above the handle wrap the rest of your fingers around the handle slice away from yourself one cutting and keep your fingers curled away from the blade when holding food
